lines.text: Y'know, I've found very few women who can handle cars.
I've found very few men who can handle women.

[inspecting the car ignition]
You have no spark!
That's the first complaint I've had.

[recoiling at Greyson's pipe smoke]
I say, Greyson, what are you smoking? Sailors' socks?

[after Algy has complained about having to walk]
What did Nature give you two feet for, anyway?
One for the clutch, one for the accelerator?

[while trapped in a room filling with poison gas]
My mother said I'd never live to a ripe old age.
